alert.note: Alert for Baker; Hamilton; Northern Columbia; Southern Columbia (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 6:21PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Baker, northern Columbia, eastern Hamilton, southeastern Echols, southwestern Brantley, southern Ware, eastern Clinch and Charlton Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 621 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles east of Fargo, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Folkston, White Springs, Fargo, Stephen Foster State Park, Taylor, Homeland, Needmore, Winfield, Manor and Suwannee Valley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Baker; Hamilton; Northern Columbia; Southern Columbia
